intro: Explore stunning, sunny islands islands and dive into a chill, cozy, zero-stress photo adventure starring… a whole bunch of extremely dramatic, extremely adorable cats!
description:
Grab your camera and get ready for the cat-tastrophe of cuteness! 
No timers, no battles, no pressure—just pure, pawsitive vibes. Your mission?
Track down the island’s quirky kitty residents and snap their most purr-sonality-packed poses!

Wander across bright, bubbly islands that feel like an endless summer vacation—but keep your eyes peeled! These fuzzy superstars love to hide, lounge, stretch, and strike suspiciously perfect poses. When they’re thirsty, drop off a cute little water bowl to keep them happy!

Every photo you take lands in your super-colorful Cat-alog Album, where you can admire your masterpieces, name your new feline friends, and relive every whisker-wiggling moment.

Snap Cat:
Bright colors. Big personalities.
Cats who act like they’re the stars of their own cartoon show.
(And honestly… they kinda are.)

KEY FEATURES: 
- 17 colorful islands full of kitties 
- cozy, stress-free gameplay and feel-good atmosphere
- relaxing music, perfect for unwinding after a long day
- photo album with all your pictures and the option to name the cats
